text: Albert Joseph Mantello (born 30 April 1934) is a former Italian-Australian rules footballer who played for North Melbourne in the Victorian Football League (VFL). A strongly built and physical footballer, Mantello usually played as either a half back flanker or centreman. He captained North Melbourne in 1960 and represented Victoria in an interstate match in 1961. Albert Mantello was inducted into the North Melbourne Hall Of Fame in 2009 alongside club greats Denis Pagan and Wayne Carey.Herald Sun - North Melbourne Hall of Fame article ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1934 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:North Melbourne Football Club players Category:Living people
title: Al Mantello
